title: Expose Member ID prominently in coach UI (profile + list) with copy action

requirements.summary: Show a clearly labeled "Member ID" (member profile id) near the top of the coach-facing Member Profile page header.
acceptanceCriteria: When a coach opens a member profile (frontend/src/members/MemberProfilePage.tsx), the page shows a visible "Member ID" label and the member's `id` value.
The Member ID is visible without scrolling on typical mobile viewport sizes (placed in the header area near the member name/program).
All user-facing text related to this change is in English (e.g., "Member ID").

file_operations.description: Add a header-area line under the member name/program that renders an explicit English label "Member ID" and displays the current member.id value, styled to remain visible without scrolling on typical mobile viewports.

requirements.summary: Include a clearly labeled "Member ID" on each coach-facing Members list card without breaking layout.
acceptanceCriteria: On the Members list page (frontend/src/members/MemberListPage.tsx), each member card displays "Member ID" and the member's `id` value.
The Member ID display does not break the card layout; if long, it is truncated/wrapped in a readable way.
All user-facing text related to this change is in English.

file_operations.description: Update member cards to display an explicit English label "Member ID" plus member.id, using layout-safe styling (e.g., truncation or wrapping) so long IDs remain readable and do not break the card layout.

requirements.summary: Add a one-tap "Copy" action next to the Member ID in the coach-facing member profile header with an English confirmation state.
acceptanceCriteria: On the Member Profile page, the coach can click/tap a "Copy" button next to the displayed Member ID.
Tapping "Copy" copies the exact Member ID string to the clipboard.
The UI provides a clear English confirmation state/message (e.g., "Copied") after copying.

file_operations.description: Add a small clipboard helper that copies a provided string using the browser clipboard API with a safe fallback, enabling consistent copy behavior for the Member ID.

Add a "Copy" button next to the displayed Member ID in the profile header; on tap, copy the exact member.id string via the clipboard helper and show a clear English confirmation state/message (e.g., temporary "Copied").
